title: Details of ownership of land viz
clause_text: Details of ownership of land viz. extracts of V.F.No.7/12 or Property Register Cards, in original having date not more than six months prior to the date of submission. In case of rights accrued through registered Development Agreement or PoA, attested copies of such documents.
section: Permission and Declaration of Project by State Government :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
